Text: Je sais ce que tu veux dire, but the English title chosen by the translator on page 2 is "I, Dragon". :)
blame it on the translator; blame it on the rain

Besides "I" and "me" are constantly used in a grammatically wrong way even by native speakers. Since I am not and my English is as shoddy as my French I still think translating "Moi, Dragon" to "I, Dragon" makes perfect sense here.
Oh, and thx for the up of course!!!!
